topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563af1163687263d3310000#post_5563af1163687263d3310000
Okay, so Norman Osborn infected Peter with the Carnage Symbiote which is an offshoot of the Venom symbiote. Carnage decides to find and try to murder Peter's friends. But because Peter's best friend Harry Osborne was Venom's original host they have a deeper bond than Peter and Carnage. It comes to a climax [spoiler]hehe[/spoiler] with Harry straddling Parker's crotch taking in the symbiote and Peter yelling "We're doing it!"
